nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene

Class HitQueryContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.HitQueryContext

  • public class HitQueryContext
extends Object
    Provides per-hit query-wide context, such as captured groups. This object is passed to the whole BLSpans tree before iterating over the hits. Captured groups will register themselves here and receive an index in the captured group array, and BLSpans objects that need access to captured groups will store a reference to this context and use it later.
